<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_366</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_366</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Distribución normal e inferencia estadística</string>
            <string language="en">Normal distribution and statistical inference</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Normalverteilung und statistische Folgerung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution normale et inférence statistique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição normal e inference estatístico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione normale ed illazione statistica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κανονική διανομή και στατιστικό συμπέρασμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el tema de la inferencia estadística. Se estudian las distribuciones muestrales, la estimación de parámetros y el contraste de hipótesis.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to approach the subject of statistical inference. It studies sampling distributions, the estimation of parameters and hypothesis testing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">contraste de hipótesis</string>
            <string language="en">hypothesis testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">estimación de parámetros</string>
            <string language="en">estimation of parameters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inferencia</string>
            <string language="en">inference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">distribuciones muestrales</string>
            <string language="en">sampling distributions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, sich dem Thema der statistischen Folgerung zu nähern. 
Sie studiert Musterstückverteilungen, die Schätzung von 
Parametern und die Hypotheseprüfung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'approcher le sujet de l'inférence statistique. 
Elle étudie des distributions de prélèvement, l'évaluation 
des paramètres et le test d'hypothèse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações aproximar 
o assunto do inference estatístico. Estuda distribuições da 
amostragem, o estimation dos parâmetros e testar da hipótese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
avvicinarsi all'argomento di illazione statistica. Studia le 
distribuzioni di campione, la valutazione dei parametri e la prova di 
ipotesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να πλησιάσει το θέμα του στατιστικού συμπεράσματος. 
Μελετά τις διανομές δειγματοληψίας, την εκτίμηση των 
παραμέτρων και τη δοκιμή υπόθεσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hypotheseprüfung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schätzung von Parametern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Folgerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musterstückverteilungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">test d'hypothèse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation des paramètres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inférence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distributions de prélèvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">testar da hipótese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estimation dos parâmetros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distribuições da amostragem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prova di ipotesi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione dei parametri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distribuzioni di campione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
